title: Hanna Nikole Women's Plus Size Wide Flared Jeans High Waisted Stretchy Bell Bottom Denim Jeans with Pockets
description: Comfortable & Stretchy Jeans --- The women's plus size bell bottom jeans are made from a high-quality stretchy, cozy, durable and breathable denim fabric that ensures maximum comfort and flexibility for all-day wear

High Waist & Buttock Lifting Jeans --- Featuring a flattering flared hem and high waist design, the plus size bootcut jeans provide slim fit, tummy control and a buttock lifting effect that enhances your natural curves and charm

5 Pocket Style Jeans --- Designed with functional 4 front and back pockets, additional watch or coin pocket sewn inside the front right hip pocket, the flare bell bottom jeans offer both functionality and style. The zip fly and button closure add a classic touch.

Versatile Fashion Jeans --- Pair full length flared bottoms jeans with a blouse, shirt, top, jacket, pullover sweater, outerwear coat, and heels for a modern, chic look. Perfect as gifts for Christmas, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day, birthday, graduation, or casual wear

Choose Elegant Bell Bottom Jeans --- The casual denim pants plus size make you more confident. Please carefully refer to the size guide in the pictures before ordering. Wash light and dark clothes separately and avoid wringing or distorting the garment to maintain its shape and color
